title: Peacefood Cafe - Downtown
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, International, Raw, Juice bar, Take-out, Bakery
description: Sister to the uptown Manhattan location, this one opened in March 2013 and provides a more relaxed atmosphere. Serves all vegan fare inspired by international cuisines, and pastries are baked in-house. An all day dining menu and nightly dinner specials, including raw, juices, smoothies, coffee, and tea.
